Title: Gents Accurist stainless steel bracelet watch MB860S
Description: chapelle_jewellery Visit our eBay Shop Add us to your Favourites list > Subscribe to our Newsletter > About Chapelle Delivery The Chapelle Guarantee Gents Accurist stainless steel bracelet watch MB860S RRP £60.00 Now £40.00 Description This gents Accurist watch has a classic design. The stainless steel bracelet features polished and brushed sections and leads to the round dial. Silver coloured batons clearly mark the hours and the date window is set at the three o'clock position. This Accurist watch is also 100m water resistant. Other Brands we stock About Chapelle Chapelle Jewellery is a family run business offering jewellery and watches with discounts of up to 50% off RRP.
